metadata.description: The name of the lifecycle policy to deploy. The default value is 'optimizeCostDemo'.

metadata.displayName: Last time accessed before moving to cool.
metadata.description: Last time accessed blob to move to cool tier in days. The default value is 30 days.
Last time accessed blob to move to archive tier in days. The default value is 180 days.
The effect of the policy: DeployIfNotExists or Audit. The default value is DeployIfNotExists.
